languages.text: "Я... приношу глубочайшие извинения, Лорд-капитан. Я не желала вам навредить или оскорбить. Подобное более не повторится".

traits.locale_text: "Я... приношу глубочайшие извинения, Вольный Торговец. Я не желала вам навредить или оскорбить. Подобное более не повторится".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I... offer you my deepest apologies, Lord Captain. It was not my intention to hurt or insult you. It will never happen again."

languages.text: “我……向你致以最深切的歉意，舰长大人。我无意伤害或侮辱你，我再也不会做这种事情了。”
languages.original_text: "I... offer you my deepest apologies, Lord Captain. It was not my intention to hurt or insult you. It will never happen again."

traits.locale_text: “我……向你致以最深切的歉意，舰长大人。我无意伤害或侮辱你，我再也不会做这种事情了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I... offer you my deepest apologies, Lord Captain. It was not my intention to hurt or insult you. It will never happen again."

languages.text: «Per... permítame que le ofrezca mis más sinceras disculpas, Lord Capitán. No tenía intención de herirle ni insultarle. No se repetirá».
languages.original_text: "I... offer you my deepest apologies, Lord Captain. It was not my intention to hurt or insult you. It will never happen again."

traits.locale_text: «Per... permítame que le ofrezca mis más sinceras disculpas, Lord Capitán. No tenía intención de herirle ni insultarle. No se repetirá».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は…深くお詫び申し上げます、ロード・キャプテン。傷つけるつもりも侮辱するつもりもありませんでした。二度といたしません」
languages.original_text: "I... offer you my deepest apologies, Lord Captain. It was not my intention to hurt or insult you. It will never happen again."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…深くお詫び申し上げます、ロード・キャプテン。傷つけるつもりも侮辱するつもりもありませんでした。二度といたしません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... bitte aufrichtig um Entschuldigung, Lord Captain. Es war nicht meine Absicht, Euch zu verletzen oder zu beleidigen. Es wird nie wieder vorkommen."
languages.original_text: "I... offer you my deepest apologies, Lord Captain. It was not my intention to hurt or insult you. It will never happen again."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... bitte aufrichtig um Entschuldigung, Lord Captain. Es war nicht meine Absicht, Euch zu verletzen oder zu beleidigen. Es wird nie wieder vorkommen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Mes... plus plates excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je n'avais nullement l'intention de vous faire du mal ou de vous offenser. Soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que ça n'arrivera plus. »
languages.original_text: "I... offer you my deepest apologies, Lord Captain. It was not my intention to hurt or insult you. It will never happen again."

traits.locale_text: « Mes... plus plates excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je n'avais nullement l'intention de vous faire du mal ou de vous offenser. Soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que ça n'arrivera plus. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Tüm içtenliğimle özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. Niyetim seni incitmek veya sana hakaret etmek değildi. Bir daha yaşanmayacak."
languages.original_text: "I... offer you my deepest apologies, Lord Captain. It was not my intention to hurt or insult you. It will never happen again."
